articleList.title: React v16.9.0 and the Roadmap Update
articleList.desc: Over a year ago, we announced that unsafe lifecycle methods are getting renamed: componentWillMount → UNSAFE_componentWillMountcomponentWillReceiveProps → UNSAFE_componentWillReceivePropscomponentWillUpdate → UNSAFE_componentWillUpdate...
